# Security Team Skills

This directory contains security and monitoring skills managed by the security team.

## Skills in this directory

### AI Threat Detector
**Status**: Approved  
**Version**: 1.0.0  
**Description**: AI-based threat detection and monitoring

## Adding new skills

1. Create a new directory for your skill
2. Add SKILL.md with proper YAML frontmatter
3. Submit a Pull Request
4. Request review from @Dykij or @security-team (via CODEOWNERS)

## Team Contact

**Team**: @security-team  
**Lead**: @Dykij
